price: 7 Lorsqu’ils y seront jetés, ils entendront le grondement de l’Enfer qui bouillonnera
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
